query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.passwordHash, u.createdAt, u.campaign_id, c.slug, c.name 
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON u.campaign_id = c.id
WHERE u.email = 'rafaelnicolose.hotmail.com'
ORDER BY u.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
